Package io.github.thebusybiscuit.slimefun4.implementation.listeners

Class SlimefunBowListener

java.lang.Object
io.github.thebusybiscuit.slimefun4.implementation.listeners.SlimefunBowListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
Listener
public class SlimefunBowListener extends Object implements Listener
This Listener is responsible for tracking Arrows fired from a SlimefunBow.
Author:
TheBusyBiscuit

    • getProjectileData

      @Nonnull public Map<UUID,SlimefunBow> getProjectileData()
      This returns a HashMap holding the UUID of a Arrow and the associated SlimefunBow with which this Arrow was fired from.
      Returns:
      A HashMap with all actively tracked Arrows
